title: IMFACT to drop 'Take Care of My First Love' on the 27th | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me IMFACT to drop 'Take Care of My First Love' on the 27th By jennywill 10 minutes ago 1,194 0 0 0 Google+ IMFACT will be keeping up with their ' IMFACTORY ' project in February as well! The boys promised fans that they will be releasing a new song every month in 2017 in their 'IMFACTORY' project. They'll be releasing " Take Care of My First Love " on February 27th at midnight KST. 
The song is composed with lyrics written by the IMFACT members themselves, and is a medium tempo confession song. Check out the teaser image below and get ready for their next release! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
